Class Hedgehog

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • Hedgehog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Hedgehog
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This is the basic hedgehog class. It has methods for both activities that use it. The methods load different size/coloured hedgehogs into an image arraylist, which is the used for the mouse ware aspects. Note that since javadoc is not picking up caught exceptions, we included the exceptions in the local variables.

    Verison 1 (4 Hours): Creating the Hedgehog class as a datbse class with get and set methods. Done by Aashmika.

    Verison 2 (3 Hours): Creating the methods and changing the class to create arrayList, and using on Color choice methods. Done by Tiffany.

    Verison 3 (2 Hours): Printing code and all methods created in this version.

    Version:
    1 05.10.16, 2 05.19.16, 3 05.25.16 Program name: Hedgehog.java
    Author:
    Aashmika Mali modified by Tiffany Tran
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • Hedgehog

        public Hedgehog()
        The empty parameter Hedgehog class constructor. Here depending on the activity, the hedgehog array will be filled with certain hedgehog images. It will also clear all the arrayLists holding hedgehog values in this class.

        Execeptions:

        e Of type ArrayIndexOutOfBounds, it is caught when loading the difSizeHedgehogs.

    • Method Detail

      • loadDiffColourHedgehogs

        public static void loadDiffColourHedgehogs()
        This method loads the different coloured hedgehogs used in the first activity. The for loops choose a certain number of colours and storing them into an array, and get random coloured hedgehogs from the already chosen random colours.

        Local variables:

        tracker Of type MediaTracker, it is used when creating the different colored hogs.

        hedgehogsStrings A string array that holds the colors of hogs.

        unusedColours A string arrayList that holds that colors not used from random selection.

        x, y Ints used in for loops that are used for incrementing values.

        e Of type InterruptedException and is useed for the MediaTracker.

      • loadDiffSizeHedgehogs

        public static void loadDiffSizeHedgehogs()
        This method loads the different sizesd hedgehogs used in the second activity. The for loops are used to store all 6 sizes of hogs and all 6 pictures.

        Local variables:

        tracker Of type MediaTracker, it is used when creating the different sized hogs.

        x Int used in for loops that are used for incrementing values the loop to store each hog dependant on the level.

        Exceptions:

        e Of type InterruptedException and is useed for the MediaTracker.
